amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in the bill to run a national media campaign for the promotion of alternative green energies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in the Congressional Record.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
